overview: Clay Kincaid hates the nickname 'Saint', he got for being too kind to stray animals and desperate people. Especially when it comes to women. With a rough and damaged past that has left him jaded, he doesn't do committed relationships. This is before he meets Samantha Jamieson, an heiress turned runaway in need of help. When she starts to work as a waitress at his bar, he discovers that she is someone truly special and amazingâ€¦ someone that could warm his damaged heart.
tagline: Of all the bars in all of Chicago, she walks into his.
title: Dirty Sexy Saint
